name: Hammer
description: A versatile tool used for driving nails, breaking objects apart, and other construction tasks.

name: Cordless Power Drill
description: A cordless drill powered by rechargeable batteries, used for drilling holes and driving screws.

name: Screwdriver
description: A screwdriver with a cross-shaped tip, used to drive screws into various materials.

name: Adjustable Wrench Set
description: A set of adjustable wrenches in different sizes, used for gripping and turning nuts and bolts.

name: Vernier Caliper
description: A precision measuring instrument used to accurately measure linear dimensions, such as the length, width, or thickness of an object. It consists of a main scale and a sliding Vernier scale that allows for precise readings to be taken with high accuracy. Commonly used in engineering, manufacturing, and scientific applications.

name: Drill Chuck
description: A device used to hold drill bits or other rotary tools securely in place while drilling or machining operations are performed.

name: Hacksaw
description: A fine-toothed saw used for cutting metal or plastic, typically consisting of a frame with a blade held under tension.

name: Scriber
description: A pointed tool used for marking or scoring lines on metal, wood, or other materials.

name: Flat Chisel
description: A cutting tool with a flat, beveled cutting edge, typically used for cutting, shaping, or carving materials such as metal or stone.

name: Soldering Iron
description: A hand-held tool used for melting solder to join together metal components or wires in electronics or plumbing applications.

name: Divider
description: A precision measuring tool used to mark or transfer measurements between two points.

name: Micrometer
description: A precision measuring instrument used for accurately measuring dimensions to a high degree of accuracy, typically in machining or engineering applications.

name: Mallet
description: A tool with a large, flat head used to strike or drive objects without damaging them, typically made of rubber, wood, or plastic.

name: Tinker Hammer
description: A small, lightweight hammer used for delicate or precision work, typically used by tinkers or hobbyists.
